{"type":"tool_use","timestamp":1771661958298,"sessionID":"ses_380b8784dffeM8bgkC1eXq8scl","part":{"id":"prt_c7f481c8f001hn34Y7lpVXC3At","sessionID":"ses_380b8784dffeM8bgkC1eXq8scl","messageID":"msg_c7f4787f9001aCW7FrK6ZoPGUU","type":"tool","callID":"call_5388d59cf4e14c5b948486e5","tool":"write","state":{"status":"error","input":{"filePath":"/tmp/Dockerfile","content":"# Build stage
FROM maven:3.9-eclipse-temurin-21-alpine AS builder

WORKDIR /build

COPY pom.xml ./
RUN mvn dependency:go-offline -B

COPY src ./src
RUN mvn clean package -DskipTests -B

# Runtime stage
FROM eclipse-temurin:21-jre-alpine

LABEL maintainer="team@example.com" \
      version="1.0" \
      description="Analytics dashboard application"

RUN apk add --no-cache \
    curl \
    fontconfig \
    ttf-dejavu \
    ca-certificates \
    && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*

WORKDIR /app

RUN addgroup -g 1001 app && \
    adduser -u 1001 -G app -D app && \
    chown -R app:app /app

RUN mkdir -p /opt/certs && \
    curl -fsSL https://truststore.pki.rds.amazonaws.com/global/global-bundle.pem -o /opt/certs/aws-rds-ca.pem && \
    curl -fsSL https://dl.cacerts.digicert.com/DigiCertGlobalRootG2.crt.pem -o /opt/certs/azure-digicert.pem && \
    keytool -importcert -alias aws-rds-root -file /opt/certs/aws-rds-ca.pem -keystore $JAVA_HOME/lib/security/cacerts -storepass changeit -noprompt && \
    keytool -importcert -alias azure-digicert-root -file /opt/certs/azure-digicert.pem -keystore $JAVA_HOME/lib/security/cacerts -storepass changeit -noprompt && \
    rm -rf /opt/certs

COPY --from=builder --chown=app:app /build/target/*.jar /app/app.jar

EXPOSE 3000

HEALTHCHECK --interval=30s --timeout=3s --start-period=10s --retries=3 \
    CMD curl -f http://localhost:3000/api/health || exit 1

USER app

CMD ["java", "-jar", "/app/app.jar"]
"},"error":"Error: The user rejected permission to use this specific tool call.","time":{"start":1771661958291,"end":1771661958295}}}}
